title: Crashes in game then can't reconnect
body: last night and literally 20 minutes ago the game has crashed on me.  I'm playing normally when all of a sudden I get the 'attempting to reconnect' message.  Last might after about 15 of trying to launch the game it told me I had a application error.  In the end got back into the game (and placed in lower priority queue.  Tonight tried playing again.  The 1st game I played I had no problems.  2nd game I get the 'attempting to reconnect' message only this time when trying to reconnect i'm being told 'unable to connect to server' message.  I know my internet connection is sound but have no idea what to try next.  Anyone else having problems?

replies.body: Your issue sounds like a network problem failing to reach the game server and timing you out.  Even if your connection is sound, it's possible to run into problems reaching a specific server.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and resolve whatever is causing that block to occur.  Let me know how progress goes!
Been in the last game for over an hour.  Can login ok but it just comes up with the reconnect button and then tells me either it can't connect to server or I have a directx error??!!!
